titles.title: Global Environmental Protection Act of 1987
Atmosphere Protection Act of 1987
A bill entitled the "Global Environmental Protection Act of 1987."

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 12/21/1987--Introduced. Global Environmental Protection Act of 1987 - Amends the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969 to add a new title III, the Atmosphere Protection Act of 1987, to require the Federal Government to make and implement policies and programs so as to minimize environmental contamination and modification of the atmosphere.
